_description.input_graph: Path to input TensorFlow GraphDef (.pb or .pbtxt)
_description.output_graph: Path to save the optimized graph
_description.debug: Enable debug mode to dump intermediate graphs
_description.output_nodes: List of output node names (will be protected from pruning)
_description.protected_nodes: Additional nodes to protect from pruning (optional)
_description.passes: Explicit list of passes to run (overrides level, null to use level-based selection)
_description.add_passes: Additional passes to append to the default pass list
_description.remove_passes: Passes to remove from the default pass list
